text: Elisabeth "Lisa" Paus (born 19 September 1968) is a German politician who has been serving as the Federal Minister for Family Affairs, Senior Citizens, Women and Youth since 25 April 2022. She is a member of Alliance 90/The Greens. She has been a Member of the German Bundestag for the state of Berlin since 2009. ==References== Category:1968 births Category:Living people Category:Politicians from Berlin Category:Members of the German Bundestag Category:Politicians from North Rhine-Westphalia Category:Politicians of Alliance '90/The Greens Category:Family Affairs, Senior Citizens, Women and Youth ministers of Germany
title: Lisa Paus
